description: This file defines the interface for the Power Configuration Cluster in a Zigbee-based device. It includes type definitions, callback structures, creation and configuration functions, and accessors for battery and mains voltage information.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetBindingEnabled
methods.description: Sets whether the cluster should bind to a device during initialization.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterGetBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Retrieves the current battery voltage in deci-volts.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterGetBatteryPercentageRemaining
methods.description: Retrieves the remaining battery life as a percentage.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterGetMainsVoltage
methods.description: Retrieves the current mains voltage in deci-volts.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetConfigureBatteryAlarmState
methods.description: Configures whether battery alarm state reporting should be enabled.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetConfigureBatteryAlarmMask
methods.description: Configures whether the battery alarm mask should be set.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetConfigureBatteryPercentage
methods.description: Configures the reporting of battery percentage remaining.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetConfigureBatteryRechargeCycles
methods.description: Configures reporting for battery recharge cycles.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterSetConfigureBatteryVoltageMaxInterval
methods.description: Sets the maximum interval for battery voltage reporting.

methods.name: powerConfigurationClusterReadBatteryRechargeCyclesInitialValue
methods.description: Reads the initial value for battery recharge cycles.

ctags.name: acMainsStatusUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*acMainsStatusUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, bool isAcMainsCo/

ctags.name: batteryBadStatusUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryBadStatusUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, bool isBad);$/

ctags.name: batteryChargeStatusUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryChargeStatusUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, bool isLow/

ctags.name: batteryMissingStatusUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryMissingStatusUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, bool isMi/

ctags.name: batteryPercentageRemainingUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryPercentageRemainingUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uin/

ctags.name: batteryTemperatureStatusUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryTemperatureStatusUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, bool /

ctags.name: batteryVoltageUpdated
ctags.pattern: /^    void (*batteryVoltageUpdated)(void *ctx, uint64_t eui64, uint8_t endpointId, uint8_t decivol/

fields.name: void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,bool isAcMainsConnected) acMainsStatusUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,bool isBad) batteryBadStatusUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,bool isLow) batteryChargeStatusUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,bool isMissing) batteryMissingStatusUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint8_t percent) batteryPercentageRemainingUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,bool isHigh) batteryTemperatureStatusUpdated
void (*)(void * ctx,uint64_t eui64,uint8_t endpointId,uint8_t decivolts) batteryVoltageUpdated
